# Request for Information (RFI) - Cyber Threat Prevention

## Solicitation Information

*   Solicitation ID: 100021580
*   Contracting Entity: Employment and Social Development Canada (EDSC)
*   Region of Operation and Delivery: Canada

## Request for Information Description

The Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking information from qualified suppliers regarding subscription-type services for cyber threat prevention, protection, response, and recovery. The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to collect information from suppliers that can provide the necessary information and services to meet the requirements outlined in Annex A – Requirements.

## Background and Context

The Cyber and IT Security (CITS) part of the ESDC has been working on secure cloud initiatives for several years. They have utilized a service from the Center for Internet Security (CIS) through Shared Services Canada. Recently, the ESDC has obtained a membership on its own, providing access to up-to-date information on cyber threat prevention, protection, response, and recovery.

The CITS team requires ongoing assistance in installing and using security scanning tools to secure the organization and specific platforms. These tools enable administrators to verify that the computers in the network have their security configuration set to an industry standard.

## Key Requirements and Information Requested

*   Subscription-type services for cyber threat prevention, protection, response, and recovery
*   Information and services listed in Annex A - Requirements, including benchmarks, scanning tools, guidelines, and other related information on secure configurations for secure cloud initiatives
*   Ongoing assistance and support for installing and using security scanning tools
*   Vendor-neutral configuration guides for secure cloud initiatives
